title: new enlarge label shuffling sampler
body_html:
a new sampler used to deal with imbalanced data, proposed from ImageNet2016 scene classification champion. Increase the accuracy rate for 0.1% in my case.

the classifier will behave badly on the data that has far less data than other classes. The function manipulates the label indices so that each class will have the same amount of training data (by randomly repeating on rarer data).

body:
a new sampler used to deal with imbalanced data, proposed from ImageNet2016 scene classification champion. Increase the accuracy rate for 0.1% in my case.

the classifier will behave badly on the data that has far less data than other classes. The function manipulates the label indices so that each class will have the same amount of training data (by randomly repeating on rarer data).
